text: Walter Alfred Bahr (April 1, 1927 â€“ June 18, 2018) was an American professional soccer player. He was thought to be one of the greatest ever in his country.Walter Bahr in the National Soccer Hall of Fame He was the long- time captain of the U.S. national team and played in the 1950 FIFA World Cup. Bahr died on June 18, 2018, in Boalsburg, Pennsylvania, from complications related to a broken hip, aged 91. ==References== ==Other websites== *Lopez, Tobias, Walter Bahr remembers , February 22, 2004 Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from fractured hip Category:American soccer players Category:American soccer coaches Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia
title: Walter Bahr
